cards.title: Project Charter
cards.text: Download the Project Charter document that outlines the overall objectives, goals, and scope of the project. This document serves as a foundational reference for the project's direction and progress.

cards.title: Project Proposal
cards.text: Download the Project Proposal document which details the plan for the project, including the methodology, timeline, resources, and expected deliverables. This document is crucial for project approval and stakeholder alignment.

cards.title: Research Paper
cards.text: Download the Research Paper that presents the in-depth study, analysis, and findings related to the project's key themes. It provides valuable insights and data gathered through research during the project.

cards.title: Final Thesis
cards.text: Download the Final Thesis document, which is the culmination of all research, analysis, and project work. This thesis summarizes the project’s results, conclusions, and recommendations for future work.

cards.title: Status Document
cards.text: Download the Status Document which provides periodic updates on the project's progress. It includes milestones, achievements, challenges, and any adjustments made to the project’s plan.

cards.title: Research Logbook
cards.text: Download the Research Logbook that contains detailed records of research activities, observations, and notes. It helps track the progress of the research and any significant discoveries made during the project.

cards.title: Business Plan
cards.text: Download the Business Plan which outlines the strategic direction, marketing strategies, financial projections, and goals for the project’s sustainability and future growth.
